Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Fighter Dedication: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Interrogation: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Investigator Skills: Skill Trained (Society; Choose 6 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 4 from any)
Skill Training (Architecture Lore): Skill Trained (Architecture Lore)
Clue In: (R) Gives another creature +1 on the triggering Perception or skill check that will help to answer an active investigation question once per 10 min
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Interrogation: Can Pursue A Lead and Make An Impression simultaneously
Keen Recollection: +5 on untrained Recall Knowledge checks
No Cause For Alarm: Successful Diplomacy reduces frightened levels by 1 in a 10' emanation, or by 2 on a critical success
Pointed Question: (1) Successful Diplomacy vs. Will gives +2 Perception to detect a Lie and inflicts off-guard vs. Attack Stratagem until the end of the turn; critical success gives +4 Perception; critical failure worsens the target's attitude by 1 step
Pursue A Lead: Can use 1 min examining a detail to detect a deeper mystery; success allows opening an investigation and gives +1 on later Perception and skill checks when attempting to answer a central question about it
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead and can be targeted with a DC 5 flat check
Skill Stratagem: (1) Refrains from attacking a chosen creature to gain +1 on the next intelligence-, wisdom-, or charisma-based skill or Perception check involving it before the start of the next turn
Combat
Hit Points: 76 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity (1 max); untrained) Class DC: Fighter: 14 (strength; trained); Investigator: 19 (intelligence; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+2 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+2 B; dexterity; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+2 P/S; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Diverse Weapon Expert: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons)/Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons)
Fighter Dedication: Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons)/Class Trained (Fighter)
Fighter Resiliency: +18 Hit Points
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Bo Staff): Weapon Familiarity (Bo Staff)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Attack Stratagem: (1) Uses a pre-rolled value for the first attack vs. a chosen creature before the start of the next turn; can substitute intelligence for strength or dexterity on the attack if using a sap or an agile, finesse, or ranged weapon
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Strategic Strike: Successful Attack Stratagems that use intelligence inflict +2d6 HP precision
Save: Fortitude: +9 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +12 (dexterity; expert); Will: +11 (wisdom; expert)
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Maneuver Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic maneuver feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 6 allocated
Diverse Weapon Expert Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, fighter dedication feature (currently 1) and max weapon training (currently 2) >= 2 or unarmed attacks rank (currently 2) >= 2
